gmd:title.gco:CharacterString: AIXM 5.1 Obstacle data set sample for DONLON Area 1; Full initial data set (Eff Date: 2019-12-05)

gmd:abstract.gco:CharacterString: DONLON Area 1 Obstacle data set sample (Full initial data set). Data collection and publication according ICAO Annex 15 (16th Edition July 2018) requirements.

gmd:useLimitation.gco:CharacterString: To be used for demonstration purposes only! Any operational usage is prohibited!

aixm:LinguisticNote.aixm:note: Obstacle Owner: DONLON TELECOM, Donlon Street 100, 2020 DOLNLON, Phone: +00123456789, email: info@donlontele.com
